artist: Il'ia Zdanevich, called Iliazd; Librairie Universalle, Paris
creditline: The Modernism Collection, gift of Norwest Bank Minnesota
description: black ink on tan paper; text in French and Russian languages, including map and "41", in URQ
provenance: Norwest Bank, Minneapolis; given to MIA, 1998.
title: Poster for conference "L'Eloge de Ilia Zdanevitch"
